name: King's Ransom (ZX Spectrum Next)
description:
This software runs on the ZX Spectrum Next home micro.

To run, copy the folder and contents onto your Next's SD Card, then load "Kings Ransom.TAP" from the browser. Push N for Next mode when loading. You might also want to adjust the CPU speed for more responsiveness.

King's Ransom is a conversion of a very short and simple text adventure that was given away with The Graphic Adventure Creator from Incentive Software.

This was created as part of a turorial video on making text adventures for the Spectrum Next.
